title: How to Make an Easy Low Calorie Dessert

steps.headline: Pour gelatin mix into a large bowl.
Pour boiling water into a measuring cup.
Pour the boiling water into the large bowl, stirring it into the gelatin.
steps.description: Keep stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved, about 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Add 2 cups of whipped topping and two small containers of yogurt.
steps.description: Stir in with wire whisk until well blended.

steps.headline: Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm.
Top with remaining whipped topping just before serving.

text: Boil approximately 1 cup of water.  Pour gelatin mix into a large bowl.  Pour boiling water into a measuring cup. Measure out 2/3 of a cup. Pour the boiling water into the large bowl, stirring it into the gelatin. Keep stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved, about 2 minutes. Add 2 cups of whipped topping and two small containers of yogurt. Stir in with wire whisk until well blended. Spoon mixture into pie crust.  Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm.  Top with remaining whipped topping just before serving.
sentences: Pour gelatin mix into a large bowl.
Pour boiling water into a measuring cup.
Pour the boiling water into the large bowl, stirring it into the gelatin.
Keep stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved, about 2 minutes.
Add 2 cups of whipped topping and two small containers of yogurt.
Stir in with wire whisk until well blended.
Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm.
Top with remaining whipped topping just before serving.
